trans-unit.source: Represents a field that displays navigation controls in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager"></xref> control enable users to page through data.
trans-unit.target: 表示一个字段，显示中的导航控件<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager"></xref>控件使用户能够分页浏览数据。

trans-unit.source: The NextPreviousPagerField class represents a field that displays navigation controls in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager> control.
trans-unit.target: NextPreviousPagerField 类表示一个字段，显示中的导航控件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager>

trans-unit.source: These navigation controls can be used to page through data that are displayed by a control that implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IPageableItemContainer> interface, such as the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用这些导航控件实现的控件显示的数据进行分页到<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IPageableItemContainer>接口，如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IPageableItemContainer>

trans-unit.source: The NextPreviousPagerField class provides buttons that enable users to navigate through the pages of data one page at a time, or to jump to the first or last page of data.
trans-unit.target: NextPreviousPagerField 类提供按钮使用户能够一次，一页数据的页导航或跳转到第一个或最后一个数据页。

trans-unit.source: You can customize the appearance of the NextPreviousPagerField object by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ButtonCssClass%2A> property to set the style of the buttons.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用自定义 NextPreviousPagerField 对象的外观的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ButtonCssClass%2A>属性可设置按钮的样式。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ButtonCssClass%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ButtonType%2A> property to choose the type of button that is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 你还可以使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ButtonType%2A>属性来选择显示的按钮的类型。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ButtonType%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the available button types.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出了可用的按钮类型。

trans-unit.source: |Button type|Description| |-----------------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType>|A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button> control.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType>|An <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton> control.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType>|A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton> control.| You can hide a NextPreviousPagerField object in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager> control by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField.Visible%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: |按钮类型 |说明 | |-----------------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>控件。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton>控件。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton>控件。 | 可以隐藏中的 NextPreviousPagerField 对象<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager>通过设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField.Visible%2A>属性`false`。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField.Visible%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType>

trans-unit.source: You can also hide the individual buttons (the first-page, previous-page, next-page, and last-page buttons) by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ShowFirstPageButton%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ShowPreviousPageButton%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ShowNextPageButton%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ShowLastPageButton%2A> properties to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 您还可以通过设置隐藏各个按钮 （第一页、 前一页、 下一步页和最后一页按钮） <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ShowFirstPageButton%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ShowPreviousPageButton%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ShowNextPageButton%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ShowLastPageButton%2A>属性设置为`false`。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ShowLastPageButton%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ShowNextPageButton%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ShowPreviousPageButton%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ShowFirstPageButton%2A>

trans-unit.source: The NextPreviousPagerField control enables you to specify custom text for each button by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.FirstPageText%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.PreviousPageText%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.NextPageText%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.LastPageText%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: NextPreviousPagerField 控制，你可以通过使用指定的每个按钮的自定义文本<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.FirstPageText%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.PreviousPageText%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.NextPageText%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.LastPageText%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.LastPageText%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.NextPageText%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.PreviousPageText%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.FirstPageText%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ButtonType%2A> property is set to `ButtonType.Image`, you must provide the URL to an image that will be displayed for the button.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ButtonType%2A>属性设置为`ButtonType.Image`，必须提供该按钮将显示图像的 URL。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ButtonType%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can set images individually for each button by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.FirstPageImageUrl%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.PreviousPageImageUrl%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.NextPageImageUrl%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.LastPageImageUrl%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 可以通过设置设置为每个按钮的单独映像<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.FirstPageImageUrl%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.PreviousPageImageUrl%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.NextPageImageUrl%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.LastPageImageUrl%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.LastPageImageUrl%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.NextPageImageUrl%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.PreviousPageImageUrl%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.FirstPageImageUrl%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ButtonType%2A> property is set to `ButtonType.Image`, the corresponding text property acts as the alternate text for the image.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ButtonType%2A>属性设置为`ButtonType.Image`，对应的文本属性充当图像的替换文字。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ButtonType%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, the text that is specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.FirstPageText%2A> property is displayed as the alternate text for the first-page image button.
trans-unit.target: 例如，通过指定的文本<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.FirstPageText%2A>属性显示为第一页图像按钮的替换文字。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.FirstPageText%2A>

trans-unit.source: In browsers that support tooltips, this text is also displayed as a tooltip.
trans-unit.target: 在支持工具提示的浏览器，此文本也显示为工具提示。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Use the NextPreviousPagerField constructor to initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField> class.
trans-unit.target: NextPreviousPagerField 构造函数用于初始化<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField>类</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField>的新实例

trans-unit.source: This constructor is typically used when you are adding fields to a dynamically created <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager> control.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数通常用于将字段添加到动态创建<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager>

trans-unit.source: To add a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField> object dynamically to a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager> control, create a new <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField> object, set its properties, and then add it to the field collection for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager> control.
trans-unit.target: 若要添加<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField>动态对象<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager>控制，请新建一个<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField>对象、 设置其属性，并将其添加到的字段集合<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the cascading style sheet (CSS) class that is used to render the buttons of the pager field on the browser.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置用于呈现页导航字段的浏览器上的按钮的级联样式表 (CSS) 类。

trans-unit.source: Use the ButtonCssClass property to specify the CSS class to render on the browser for the buttons of the pager field.
trans-unit.target: ButtonCssClass 属性用于指定要在浏览器的页导航字段的按钮上的呈现的 CSS 类。

trans-unit.source: This property will always be rendered as the class attribute, regardless of the browser.
trans-unit.target: 此属性始终将呈现为的类特性，而不考虑浏览器。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > On browsers that do not support CSS, setting the ButtonCssClass property has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 浏览器上不支持 CSS，ButtonCssClass 属性设置不起作用。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is stored in viewstate.
trans-unit.target: 在 viewstate 中存储此属性的值。

trans-unit.source: The CSS class used to render the buttons of the pager field on the client.
trans-unit.target: 用于呈现页导航字段客户端上的按钮的 CSS 类。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string, which indicates that the ButtonCssClass property is not set.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为空字符串，指示未设置 ButtonCssClass 属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the button type to display in the pager field.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置要在页导航字段中显示的按钮类型。

trans-unit.source: Use the ButtonType property to specify which type of button is displayed in a button field.
trans-unit.target: 使用 ButtonType 属性以指定在按钮字段中显示哪种类型的按钮。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the available button types.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出了可用的按钮类型。

trans-unit.source: |Button type value|Description| |-----------------------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType>|A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button> control.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType>|An <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton> control.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType>|A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton> control.| When ButtonType is set to `ButtonType.Image`, you must set the image to display for the buttons by using the properties shown in the following table.
trans-unit.target: |按钮类型值 |说明 | |-----------------------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>控件。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton>控件。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton>控件。 | 当 ButtonType 设置为`ButtonType.Image`，必须设置要通过使用下表中显示的属性显示的按钮的图像。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType>

trans-unit.source: |Property|Description| |--------------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.FirstPageImageUrl%2A>|The URL to an image to display for the first-page button.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.PreviousPageImageUrl%2A>|The URL to an image to display for the previous-page button.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.NextPageImageUrl%2A>|The URL to an image to display for the next-page button.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.LastPageImageUrl%2A>|The URL to an image to display for the last-page button.| The value of the ButtonType property is stored in viewstate.
trans-unit.target: |属性 |说明 | |--------------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.FirstPageImageUrl%2A>|若要显示的第一页按钮图像的 URL。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.PreviousPageImageUrl%2A>|若要显示有关上一页按钮的图像 URL。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.NextPageImageUrl%2A>|若要显示有关下一步按钮的图像 URL。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.LastPageImageUrl%2A>|若要显示有关最后一页按钮图像的 URL。 | 在 viewstate 中存储 ButtonType 属性的值。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.LastPageImageUrl%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.NextPageImageUrl%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.PreviousPageImageUrl%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.FirstPageImageUrl%2A>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 之一<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_ButtonType.Link" name="ButtonType.Link" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_ButtonType.Link" name="ButtonType.Link" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The value for the ButtonType property is not one of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: ButtonType 属性的值不是之一<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: Copies the properties of the current <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField"></xref> object to the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 将当前的属性复制<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField"></xref>到指定的对象<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: The CopyProperties method is a helper method.
trans-unit.target: CopyProperties 方法是一个帮助器方法。

trans-unit.source: It is used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField.CloneField%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to copy the properties of the current <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField> object to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField> object that is passed in the `newField` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 它由<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField.CloneField%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法复制当前的属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField>对象传递给<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField>中传递的对象`newField`参数。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField.CloneField%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField"></xref> to copy the properties of the current <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField"></xref> to.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField"> </xref>以复制当前属性<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField"></xref>到。

trans-unit.source: Creates the user interface (UI) controls for the pager field object and adds them to the specified container.
trans-unit.target: 创建用户界面 (UI) 控件的页导航字段对象并将它们添加到指定的容器。

trans-unit.source: The CreateDataPagers method is used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.CreatePagerFields%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to create the UI controls for the pager field, such as the Previous and Next buttons.
trans-unit.target: 将使用 CreateDataPagers 方法的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.CreatePagerFields%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法来创建 UI 控制页导航字段，如上一步和下一步按钮。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.CreatePagerFields%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The container that is used to store the controls.
trans-unit.target: 用于存储控件的容器。

trans-unit.source: The index of the first record on the page.
trans-unit.target: 在页面上的第一个记录的索引。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of items on a single page.
trans-unit.target: 在一页最大项数。

trans-unit.source: The total number of items.
trans-unit.target: 项的总数。

trans-unit.source: The index of the data pager field in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.Fields*> collection.
trans-unit.target: 中的数据页导航字段的索引<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.Fields*>集合。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.Fields*>

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 创建并返回的新实例<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: The CreateField method is a helper method that is used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField.CloneField%2A> method of the base class to create an empty <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField> object.
trans-unit.target: CreateField 方法是使用一个帮助器方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField.CloneField%2A>方法的基类，来创建一个空<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField>对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField.CloneField%2A>

trans-unit.source: A new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 新实例<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified object is equal to the current <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 确定指定的对象是否等于当前<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: Use the Equals method to determine whether the current <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField> object is equal to the object that is specified by the `o` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Equals 方法用于确定是否当前<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField>对象是否等于指定的对象`o`参数。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField>

trans-unit.source: Equals returns `true` if the two objects contain exactly the same values for all public properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField> class.
trans-unit.target: 等于返回`true`如果两个对象包含完全相同的值的所有公共属性的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField>类。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField>

trans-unit.source: The object to compare with the current <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: 要与当前比较的对象<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField"></xref>实例。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified object is equal to the current <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField"></xref> object; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果指定的对象是否等于当前<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField"></xref>对象; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the URL to an image that is displayed for the first-page button.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置显示的第一页按钮的图像的 URL。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ButtonType%2A> property is set to `ButtonType.Image` and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ShowFirstPageButton%2A> property is set to `true`, use the FirstPageImageUrl property to specify the URL to an image that is displayed for the first-page button.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ButtonType%2A>属性设置为`ButtonType.Image`和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ShowFirstPageButton%2A>属性设置为`true`，FirstPageImageUrl 属性用于指定为第一页按钮显示图像的 URL。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ShowFirstPageButton%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ButtonType%2A>

trans-unit.source: This image can be in any file format (.jpg, .gif, .bmp, and so on) that is supported in the browser.
trans-unit.target: 此映像可以在浏览器支持任何文件格式 （.jpg、.gif、.bmp、 等）。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ButtonType%2A> property is set to a value other than `ButtonType.Image`, setting the FirstPageImageUrl property has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ButtonType%2A>属性设置为值`ButtonType.Image`，设置 FirstPageImageUrl 属性不起作用。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ButtonType%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is stored in viewstate.
trans-unit.target: 在 viewstate 中存储此属性的值。

trans-unit.source: The URL to an image that is displayed for the first-page button.
trans-unit.target: 第一页按钮显示图像的 URL。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that the FirstPageImageUrl property is not set.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为空字符串 ("")，指示未设置 FirstPageImageUrl 属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text that is displayed for the first-page button.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置显示的第一页按钮的文本。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ShowFirstPageButton%2A> property is set to `true`, use the FirstPageText property to specify the text to display for the first-page button.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ShowFirstPageButton%2A>属性设置为`true`，FirstPageText 属性用于指定要显示的第一页按钮的文本。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ShowFirstPageButton%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ButtonType%2A> property is set to `ButtonType.Image`, the image is displayed and the FirstPageText property acts as the alternate text for the image.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ButtonType%2A>属性设置为`ButtonType.Image`，会显示该图像并且 FirstPageText 属性可作为图像的替换文字。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ButtonType%2A>

trans-unit.source: On browsers that support tooltips, this text is also displayed as a tooltip.
trans-unit.target: 在支持工具提示的浏览器，此文本也显示为工具提示。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is stored in viewstate, and it can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的值存储在视图状态，它可以自动保存到的资源文件通过使用设计器工具。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute> and [Globalization and Localization](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>和[全球化和本地化](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: The text that is displayed for the first-page button.
trans-unit.target: 第一页按钮显示的文本。

trans-unit.source: The default is "First".
trans-unit.target: 默认值为"第一次"。

trans-unit.source: Serves as a hash function for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 用作哈希函数<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: A hash code for the current <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 当前的哈希代码<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: Handles events that occur in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField"></xref> control and performs the appropriate action.
trans-unit.target: 处理中发生的事件<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField"></xref>控件并执行适当的操作。

trans-unit.source: The HandleEvent method is a helper method that is used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.OnBubbleEvent%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: HandleEvent 方法是使用一个帮助器方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.OnBubbleEvent%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.OnBubbleEvent%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: It is called to handle events that occur in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField> object when one of the buttons inside the control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 它将调用来处理中发生事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField>对象的一个按钮在控件内单击时。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField>

trans-unit.source: The HandleEvent method examines the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandName%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs> object that is contained in the `e` parameter, and then performs the appropriate action.
trans-unit.target: HandleEvent 方法检查<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandName%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs>中包含的对象`e`参数，然后执行相应的措施。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandName%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the buttons that are provided by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField> control and the action that is performed when the button is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出了由提供的按钮<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField>控制和单击按钮时执行的操作。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField>

trans-unit.source: |Button|CommandName value|Action| |------------|-----------------------|------------| |First page|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlCommands.FirstPageCommandArgument?displayProperty=fullName>|Navigates to the first page of data.| |Previous page|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlCommands.PreviousPageCommandArgument?displayProperty=fullName>|Navigates to the previous page of data.| |Next page|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlCommands.NextPageCommandArgument?displayProperty=fullName>|Navigates to the next page of data.| |Last page|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlCommands.LastPageCommandArgument?displayProperty=fullName>|Navigates to the last page of data.|
trans-unit.target: |按钮 |CommandName 值 |操作 | |------------|-----------------------|------------| |第一页 |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlCommands.FirstPageCommandArgument?displayProperty=fullName>|导航到数据的第一页。 | |前一页 |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlCommands.PreviousPageCommandArgument?displayProperty=fullName>|导航到数据的前一页。 | |下一页 |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlCommands.NextPageCommandArgument?displayProperty=fullName>|导航至下一页数据。 | |最后一页 |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlCommands.LastPageCommandArgument?displayProperty=fullName>|导航到最后一个数据页。 |</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlCommands.LastPageCommandArgument?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlCommands.NextPageCommandArgument?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlCommands.PreviousPageCommandArgument?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlCommands.FirstPageCommandArgument?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: 事件数据。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the URL to an image that is displayed for the last-page button in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置中的最后一页按钮显示的图像的 URL <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField"> </xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ButtonType%2A> property is set to `ButtonType.Image` and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ShowLastPageButton%2A> property is set to `true`, use the LastPageImageUrl property to specify the URL to an image that is displayed for the last-page button.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ButtonType%2A>属性设置为`ButtonType.Image`和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ShowLastPageButton%2A>属性设置为`true`，LastPageImageUrl 属性用于指定最后一页按钮显示图像的 URL。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ShowLastPageButton%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ButtonType%2A>

trans-unit.target: 此映像可以在浏览器支持任何文件格式 （.jpg、.gif、.bmp、 等）。

trans-unit.target: 显示为下一步按钮的文本。

trans-unit.source: The default is "Next".
trans-unit.target: 默认值为"下一步"。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the URL to an image that is displayed for the previous-page button in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField"></xref> object.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ButtonType%2A> property is set to `ButtonType.Image` and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ShowPreviousPageButton%2A> property is set to `true`, use the PreviousPageImageUrl property to specify the URL to an image that is displayed for the previous-page button.

trans-unit.source: The text that is displayed for the previous-page button.
trans-unit.target: 显示为上一页按钮的文本。

trans-unit.source: The default is "Previous".
trans-unit.target: 默认值为"上一步"。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether disabled buttons are rendered as <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label"></xref> controls by the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否禁用的按钮呈现为<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label"></xref>控制通过<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: Use the RenderDisabledButtonsAsLabels property to specify whether disabled buttons are rendered as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label> controls by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField> object.
trans-unit.target: RenderDisabledButtonsAsLabels 属性用于指定是否禁用的按钮呈现为<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label>控制通过<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField>对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label>

trans-unit.source: The buttons are disabled by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField> object when the function associated with the button cannot be performed.
trans-unit.target: 通过会禁用该按钮<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField>对象时无法执行对与按钮相关联的功能。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField>

trans-unit.source: For example, when you are in the first page of data, the first-page and previous-page buttons are disabled.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果你处于数据的第一页时，将禁用第一页和上一页按钮。

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField> object renders the disabled buttons by using the control type specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ButtonType%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField>对象使用指定的控件类型的呈现禁用的按钮<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ButtonType%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ButtonType%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField>

trans-unit.source: It also sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Enabled%2A> property of the control to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 它还将设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Enabled%2A>该控件的属性`false`。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Enabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: When RenderDisabledButtonsAsLabels is set to `true`, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField> object uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label> control to render the disabled buttons.
trans-unit.target: 当 RenderDisabledButtonsAsLabels 设置为`true`、<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField>对象使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label>控件呈现禁用的按钮。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField>

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ButtonCssClass%2A> property is used to set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.CssClass%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label> control.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ButtonCssClass%2A>属性用于设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.CssClass%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.CssClass%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ButtonCssClass%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is stored in viewstate.
trans-unit.target: 在 viewstate 中存储此属性的值。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if disabled buttons are rendered as <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label"></xref> controls; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果禁用的按钮呈现为<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label"></xref>控制; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether non-breaking spaces are rendered between controls.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，指示是否呈现控件之间的非换行空格。

trans-unit.source: Use the RenderNonBreakingSpacesBetweenControls property to specify whether non-breaking spaces (the HTML ` ` character) are rendered between the navigation controls of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField> object.
trans-unit.target: RenderNonBreakingSpacesBetweenControls 属性用于指定是否不间断空格 (HTML` `字符) 之间的导航控件呈现<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField>对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField>

trans-unit.source: You can set RenderNonBreakingSpacesBetweenControls to `false` if you need more control over the layout that you are creating with cascading style sheet (CSS) classes.
trans-unit.target: 你可以设置到 RenderNonBreakingSpacesBetweenControls`false`如果需要更好地控制你创建使用级联样式表 (CSS) 类的布局。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is stored in viewstate.
trans-unit.target: 在 viewstate 中存储此属性的值。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if non-breaking spaces are rendered between controls; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果非换行空格呈现控件; 之间否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the first-page button is displayed in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否将第一页按钮显示在<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: Use the ShowFirstPageButton property to show or hide the first-page button of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField> object.
trans-unit.target: 使用 ShowFirstPageButton 属性来显示或隐藏的第一页按钮<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField>对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField>

trans-unit.source: To show the first-page button, set the ShowFirstPageButton property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要显示的第一页按钮，请将 ShowFirstPageButton 属性设置为`true`。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is stored in viewstate.
trans-unit.target: 在 viewstate 中存储此属性的值。
